welcome_message_body: Welcome to Meridian, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, historic downtown, and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Weidmann's

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, providing a more personalized and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
